document_data.name: Caladorn Cassalanter's Residence
document_data.mainbody: '''Caladorn Cassalanter's residence''' was a row house and the home of [[Caladorn Cassalanter]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The home stood three stories tall.
document_data.Location: Caladorn Cassalanter's residence was located in the west section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] just north of [[Piergeiron's Palace]] on the the eastern side of [[Swords Street]].
